attributes.action: DO NOT revoke Article 50, stand by the decision to leave the EU.
attributes.additional_details: The Writer is a managing director for a UK family food manufacturing company established in 1912 . The two directors of which voted for in and out in the Brexit referendum. Everything that helps bring Brexit to the earliest conclusion in line with the democratic process of our country  should be done.
attributes.background: The petition to revoke Article 50 would have more credibility if there was a similar opportunity for those who disagree with it.  Perhaps all petitions should provide participants the option to agree or disagree in the first place.
